snippet: Military officials said attacks were launched against the Boko Haram Islamist group in border areas in a forest south of the city of Maiduguri.
abstract: Nigerian military steps up its attacks against suspected bases of Boko Haram Islamist group in remote border areas.

byline.contributor: Hamza Idris contributed from Bauchi, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Military officials said attacks were launched against the Boko Haram Islamist group in border areas in a forest south of the city of Maiduguri.

headline.main: In Nigeria, More Attacks on Militants
headline.print_headline: In Nigeria, More Attacks On Militants
